h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong
content: She can also lunge toward you while clawing the ground on both sides of her body as she passes. Each spot she hits will erupt with a bolt of lightning, so you'll need to avoid her charging body without rolling into these spots on accident, and be ready for a secondary charge from above as she does it again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong'.
The content is as follows:
She can also lunge toward you while clawing the ground on both sides of her body as she passes. Each spot she hits will erupt with a bolt of lightning, so you'll need to avoid her charging body without rolling into these spots on accident, and be ready for a secondary charge from above as she does it again.
